channel.title: PI Error Connecting To Server
channel.description:
ok. so ive changed the server = 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip. my port if forwarded. my server is up. rune locus says the server is up. my no-ip duc is updated + running.
And i still get error connecting to server? Im using Broken x2. I cant connect to my server on moparscape client either.
Help please?
Sorry for alot of topics:/ i just need help. :mad:

item.title: PI Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

ohad:

you probably forgot to change in client if google says its up…

.
//server = “localhost”;
//server = “0.0.0.0”;
server = “survivescape.no-ip.biz”;

Read full topic
